name: DropdownButton
desc: A Material Design button for selecting from a list of items.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of items the user can select.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value of the currently selected [DropdownMenuItem].

fields.name: hint
fields.desc: A placeholder widget that is displayed by the dropdown button.

fields.name: disabledHint
fields.desc: A preferred placeholder widget that is displayed when the dropdown is disabled.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.dropdownButton.onChanged} Called when the user selects an item.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when the dropdown button is tapped.

fields.name: selectedItemBuilder
fields.desc: A builder to customize the dropdown buttons corresponding to the [DropdownMenuItem]s in [items].

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place the menu when open.

fields.name: style
fields.desc: The text style to use for text in the dropdown button and the dropdown menu that appears when you tap the button.

fields.name: underline
fields.desc: The widget to use for drawing the drop-down button's underline.

fields.name: icon
fields.desc: The widget to use for the drop-down button's icon.

fields.name: iconDisabledColor
fields.desc: The color of any [Icon] descendant of [icon] if this button is disabled, i.e. if [onChanged] is null.

fields.name: iconEnabledColor
fields.desc: The color of any [Icon] descendant of [icon] if this button is enabled, i.e. if [onChanged] is defined.

fields.name: iconSize
fields.desc: The size to use for the drop-down button's down arrow icon button.

fields.name: isDense
fields.desc: Reduce the button's height.

fields.name: isExpanded
fields.desc: Set the dropdown's inner contents to horizontally fill its parent.

fields.name: itemHeight
fields.desc: If null, then the menu item heights will vary according to each menu item's intrinsic height.

fields.name: menuWidth
fields.desc: The width of the menu.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the button's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: dropdownColor
fields.desc: The background color of the dropdown.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: Padding around the visible portion of the dropdown widget.

fields.name: menuMaxHeight
fields.desc: The maximum height of the menu.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: Defines how the hint or the selected item is positioned within the button.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: Defines the corner radii of the menu's rounded rectangle shape.
